alert.note: Alert for Sevier (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 6:12PM CST until January 11 at 3:45AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of east Tennessee, including the following county, Sevier. * WHEN...Until 1245 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 712 PM EST, local law enforcement reported flooding in the warned area. Flooding is already occurring. Between 1.5 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Sevierville, Gatlinburg and Pigeon Forge. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
